entry.content:
Salman Rushdie has been stabbed during an NYC book event, condition unknown.
I'll just link to the twitter feed:
https://twitter.com/search?q=%22Salman%20Rushdie%22&src=trend_click&pt=1558109869152018433&vertical=trends
There's even some footage of after the stabbing, showing him being evacuated via helicopter. Pretty gruesome stuff.
My question is, where was the security. There is a fatwa on this guy... people associated with the book have been killed (notably a Japanese translator). There should have been metal detectors or something, yet the assailant was able to smuggle a knife into the venue and ambush him on stage.
